heading: HB04699
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE METRO MANILA TRAFFIC CRISIS AS A NATIONAL EMERGENCY, GRANTING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES EMERGENCY POWERS FOR A LIMITED PERIOD OF TIME, AND ADOPTING SHORT-TERM, MID-TERM, AND LONG-TERM DEVELOPMENT PLANS FOR AN EFFICIENT TRANSPORTATION SYSTEM
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2018-12-03, transmitted to the Senate on 2018-12-04 and received by the Senate on 2018-12-04 Substituted by HB06425
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04699
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING THE METRO MANILA TRAFFIC CRISIS AS A NATIONAL EMERGENCY, GRANTING THE PRESIDENT OF THE PHILIPPINES EMERGENCY POWERS FOR A LIMITED PERIOD OF TIME, AND ADOPTING SHORT-TERM, MID-TERM, AND LONG-TERM DEVELOPMENT PLANS FOR AN EFFICIENT TRANSPORTATION SYSTEM
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ANTONIO, MICHELLE M.
DATE FILED : 2016-12-19
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2017-05-10
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2017-05-10
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 3, 38, 554, 1315, 1666, 3048, 3162, 3314, 3442, 3617, 3712, 3716, 4334, 4699 and HR No. 119 was approved with amendments.
MOTHER BILL: HB06425
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION ON 2017-01-16
